@ClassVersion(sourceVersion="$Id: EnhancedPreparedStatementBase.java 1100 2024-02-16 23:33:45Z tquadrat $") @API(status=INTERNAL, since="0.1.0") protected final class EnhancedPreparedStatementBase.ParameterMetaDataImpl extends ParameterMetaDataBase
The base class for a variant of ParameterMetaData that is used by EnhancedPreparedStatement.
